My work

I work at the Laboratory of research in new technologies of information, LINTI doing research and development. My main roll is as developer of a project called "Teaching Python With Robots and Software Libre" wich you could find here.

I have some skills at programming in C, C++ and Python. Web development and derivatives too, but I'm a lover of low-level code. My first programming experience was Assembly in a PIC16f84 in school. I'm also a Linux user so my control of the CLI is pretty good. To finish, I'm in a constant learning state, so I spend most of my reading-article time in HN.
